content:
Estonia Prime Minister Kaya Callas at the NATO summit with the Secretary General of the North Atlantic Alliance, Jens Stoltenberg, discussed the assistance of Ukraine, including providing shells.

About that Estonian Prime MinisterwroteThe Twitter Twitter.

“It is always a pleasure to meet NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg. The support of Ukraine and the importance of ammunition to Ukraine were discussed. The members of the Alliance should invest more in defense. There is no free time. Estonia costs for defense are more than 3%, ”her post reads.

Octs Stoltenbergaddedthat Ukraine really needs more support, and they need it now.

As reported by the Armyinform, NATO Secretary General Jens Stoltenberg in video reporting during the annual Kyiv Security Forumstatedthat Ukraine today has come to a full membership in the North Atlantic Alliance as never before.
title: NATO Secretary General and Estonia Prime Minister discussed the importance
description: The Estonian Prime Minister wrote on Twitter. “Always nice to meet ...
author: Army Inform
